page.title: 13ELMBRIDGE - RECREATION
page.content: Although almost every household puts television first on the list, this is by no means the sole leisure activity. Next in popularity is gardening and about half those surveyed do their own decorating and home maintenance. Only eleven people play a musical instrument but many more enjoy theatre, cinema, opera, ballet, art galleries and museums. Most households have at least one member in a club or society. These include all types of sports clubs, racing pigeons, pony club, archaeology, local history, Rotary and the National Trust. A few are members of local and voluntary groups such as PCC, WRVS, Friends of the Church, and Hospital Visitors. Most enjoy eating out at Pubs or Restaurants. Only one person has a computer and most people have a variety of active hobbies.
